data.eml:eml: A new species of Trachusa Panzer, 1804 (Megachilidae: Anthidiini) from southern Africa, with notes on the subgeneric classification and a key to the Afrotropical species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kasparek, Max (2018): A new species of Trachusa Panzer, 1804 (Megachilidae: Anthidiini) from southern Africa, with notes on the subgeneric classification and a key to the Afrotropical species. Zootaxa 4399 (3): 329-340, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4399.3.3
